content.description: Don't Stand So Close to Me to the left of the corner and Quarantine Bingo front and center in this photo. Just a couple easy moves to to top and an easy walk down. Try it in your boots!
content.location:
Just before the power lines if headed counter-clockwise on the Cox Mountain Trail Loop. Walk down the hill to the boulders by the river.

36.086452, -79.015475

content.description: Start with your hands in the crack (center) and step up to find a nice pocket near the top for your right hand. You can send this one in your hiking shoes! Just hope the river isn't so high it covers the approach!
content.location:
Just before the power lines if taking the Cox Mountain Trail loop counter-clockwise. Down the bank by the river.

Coordinates: 36.086022, -79.013850

climbs.name: Don't Stand So Close to Me

content.description: Take a break from hiking. Just a few moves to top out. Easy to walk off the top to the ground. Don't Stand So Close to Me is to the left of the corner of this boulder.
content.location:
Just before the power lines if headed counter-clockwise on the Cox Mountain Trail Loop. Walk down the hill to the boulders by the river.

36.086452, -79.015475
